server.name: io.github.kesslerio/attio-mcp-server
server.description: AI-powered Attio CRM access. Manage contacts, companies, deals, tasks, notes and workflows.
server.title: Attio MCP Server

environmentVariables.description: Your Attio API key (required for all tools except health-check)
environmentVariables.name: ATTIO_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: Optional Attio workspace ID for workspace-specific operations
environmentVariables.name: ATTIO_WORKSPACE_ID

environmentVariables.description: Tool mode: 'full' (all tools) or 'search' (search tools only). Default: 'full'
environmentVariables.name: ATTIO_MCP_TOOL_MODE
